name: URL Shortener
description: Just short links that are too long for Twitter, that contain an Affilate ID or just for convenience. With a beautiful and intuitive design, its easier than ever to make your URLs a bit shorter.   These URL providers are currently supported:   bit.ly  tinyurl.com  kutt.it  tny.im  and many more....  More may follow soon :)  Also you have all already shortened URLs in the view with your personal history.  In the statistics for bit.ly , tny.im and others you can even see how many hits your URL has and much more.  More info on https://short1.link/
